channel.title: Every server error connecting to server
channel.description: I have dled many differnet servers sources and clients to try and everytime i try to log it just says error connectign to server. i change the ip in the egui folder and still sayss error idk wats happening. if you know how to fix i would love to know

item.title: Every server error connecting to server
item.dc:creator: @mahdaviscape mahdaviscape
item.description:
@mahdaviscape wrote:

have you portforarded? or do you have utorrent with a 43595 preference port?

  2. Open the port in firewall (if it still didn’t work).
  3. Restart server.

item.dc:creator: @Mr_Despair Mr. Despair
item.description:

If YOU just want to connect change it to localhost. If other players want to connect they’d change it to your servers IP or you’d change it for them.
